text: Granada railway station is the main railway station of the Spanish city of Granada, Andalusia. ==Services== As of 2019, Granada served by AVE high-speed trains to Madrid and Barcelona, as well as Media Distancia services to Seville-Santa Justa, Algeciras and Almería. Outside the main station building there is a stop on the Granada Metro light rail line. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Andalusia Category:Buildings and structures in Granada Category:Railway stations opened in 1874
title: Granada railway station
